name: Deep Into The Night
description:
Have you ever just lost yourself in the depths of a sudden, surprise fandom? Found yourself sinking deeper and deeper in love with a new community and all the trappings it brings with it?

Think you can get out with your wallet intact? Test your luck against the newest Vtuber craze, and see if you can resist the charm of the newest dynamic duo!

A creation for LD 48, with the theme "Deeper and Deeper"! I have to admit, the theme was a bit of a tough one, but in a good way! This was a blast to develop, and might even see post-LD expansion if we can think of additions for it.
